title: Which technologies should I learn to get a good package in the IT industry? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all, I agree with Andrew Chabs. But if you really want an answer then:It also depends on which company we are talking and also in what is your field of interest. You can learn Machine Learning(for that learn MATLAB or R) or Software Defined Networks and there are many.
1. django framework based on python2. drupal  CMS (Content Management System)3. responsive design4. note.js 5. android application development.6. Angular.js7. JSF based on Java.
